oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Appalachian Exposition silver spoon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sterling silver souvenir spoon from the Appalachian Exposition, Knoxville, Tenn. Main Building pictured on bowl of spoon. Corn on handle and Tennessee State Seal on top of handle. 1910 or 1911. Eagle and flag on back of spoon handle.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fairs; Souvenirs; Spoons;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
